name: Stonewall National Monument
description: Before the 1960s, almost everything about living authentically as a lesbian, a bisexual person or a gay man was illegal. The Stonewall Uprising on June 28, 1969 is a milestone in the quest for civil rights and provided momentum for a movement.
shortDescription: Before the 1960s, almost everything about living authentically as a lesbian, a bisexual person or a gay man was illegal. The Stonewall Uprising on June 28, 1969 is a milestone in the quest for civil r...

address.line1: Intersection of Christopher, Grove, and Fourth Streets.

operatingHours.description: Off peak operation occurs November - April, with the park opening and closing daily from 7 am - 5 pm. Holidays and poor weather can be affect these hours.

climate.weatherDescription: New York City experiences all four seasons. It is typically hot in the summer and cold in the winter with cool springs and autumns.

images.title: Tulips in Christopher Park
images.altText: Pink and purple tulips in bloom with the Pride flag waving above a statue in the background.
images.caption: Tulips in Christopher Park
